Title: Stormscarred
Description:
Take a look around this beautiful town. What do you see? Ranchers 'n' their mosswools. But where  is this rancher's flock? In the guts of a beast, they are. Stormscar they call 'im. 

Stormscar, whose howl is as the thunder. Whose bite is lightning. Whose belly is full of my life's work. 

I came here to buy weapons and all we have is ranching equipment. You look strong. Would you put an end to Stormscar's reign in our pastures?
ObjectivesText: Slay Stormscar in the pastures near Rambleshire in the Isle of Dorn.
PortraitGiverText: It is said Stormscar can fell a grown ramolith with a single bite.
RewardText: Thank you, adventurer. My role in this world is to be a rancher. Yours is to slay wolves. We all have our places.
